title: I climbed to gold with Morgana!
body:
Last night I got to gold with Morgana. I started playing her, and league, in November, and 344 ranked games later with her with a 57% W/L ratio I finally finished my series. I've played her Top, Mid, Support, and Jungle. 

Now I can have a Victorious Sivir skin that I'll never use since I only know how to play Morgana. 

Next season I think I'll go for plat with her! <3
